评论详情: Very comfortable and warm

I love these sweatpants! They are very comfortable I'm 5'3 160 pounds and I bought a size large. I have the grey pair in a size medium they fit, but I have a muffin top lol and the large size has more flexibility!

I bought 2 sweats in different colors both the same size (both medium). However when I received them they both fit differently, one fit like a small and the other one fit like a medium would. I guess just keep that in mind 🤷🏻‍♀️ the quality of the fabric on the other hand feels nice and sturdy

I bought these on a whim because they looked comfortable and like they'd go good with the type of sneakers I wear every day.  I'm definitely not a sweatpants person, but these are great!They're thick, soft, comfortable and fit well (the legs are huge, definitely loose and roomy but thick enough not to collapse on themselves).  I normally wear an XS (5'6" and between 100 and 104 lbs) and the small is very comfortable on me.  I'll be wearing these inside and outside the house and would get more colors but I'm not until the remaining light-colored neutrals and the only other option is a dusty blue that won't fit into my wardrobe.

评论概述: Great pants if I were tall
评论详情: Love the pants. Thick fabric, soft to touch. Waist and hips fit great but from the thighs down, they were large and baggy. Elastic cuff too large for the ankles and about 8 inches too long. I am 5'2".
The pockets make these feel a lot tighter than they should...Not as much stretch as I normally like but they're fine for the price.
Cute for a teen. Good fit except waist is tight. Lucky i can have them loosened by my seamstress.
Incredibly soft and thick quality material. It fit so comfortably and it is very well made.

Bought 2 black and 2 grey, both in a Large(L) and the grey fit weird, so tried on the black and it fit perfect. I opened the other two of each color and the same thing. Black L fit and grey L did not, was tighter in every way. The black ones are great tho, fit nice and feel nice to the touch. Just wish for better sizing consistency

The material is very thick, almost stiff. Got the cream colored pants but in actual the color is almost neon. Doesn’t really go with any outfit. Because the material is very thick, the flap pockets don’t stay down. They stick out somewhat which isn’t a great look. Thought this would make a good travel joggers but it gets way too warm for me. Not a flattering cut for most body shapes I’d imagine.

These were a gift for her birthday, and my daughter loves the comfort and fit of them and wears them often. She generally doesn't like wearing a lot of long pants and is a shorts wearer, but makes an exception for these. She is a very small build, 4'10" and about 87 lbs, so take that into account. I bought a pair for myself and I feel they were a little less roomy than I prefer for sweatpants, but hers fit perfectly.
Arrived with a hole in the pocket, but had to use because I didn't have time to replace them.
Warm, comfy, washes well, great price

These are such a worth while buy!! They are THE softest fleece and the perfect length. I’m 5’1 with a 29 inseam and I’m about to roll the waist once. The fabric is “sturdy” if that’s a thing, with warmth.  Super flattering and hug in all the right places. Plus, I don’t normally do reviews, these pants really stuck out!

These sweatpants are thick and very soft inside. I am 5'4" and weigh 170 and medium is perfect.  They are roomy and very warm for those raw days. They are baggy and look great on.I've washed it several times and it did not shrink. It has not pilled and has retained its shape.  Lots of pockets!  Sturdy drawstring. Well worth what I paid for it.
Thick and warm. Will order another color. 5’3 145 pounds, ordered medium  and there is a lot of room. Will order a small next time
I really like color and how cozy and warm they are! They fit perfectly and breathe into them and the pockets are coool!
I love these sweats, not only are they ridiculously warm but I love the pockets. The fit is flattering and the color is that perfect white-grey.

评论概述: Thick and comfy but inconsistent color
评论详情: Great quality! So soft,  warm and thick. True to size. Great value when it’s on sale. My only qualm is the “coffeegrey” color is not consistent or a perfect match with their other products, refer to attached photo. The sweater is also from Automet.

I’ve been looking for comfy sweatpants with big pockets & cargo pockets for a hot minute. all of them either have fake pockets, thin material, weak seams, or a hellish combination of them all. THESE WERE PERFECT. the material is so thick and warm. the normal pockets are huge. the cargo pockets are huge. from my hip to my knee is essentially all pockets. incredible!! and theyre super sturdy, but I also cannot stand scratchy seams or tags, and these have NONE. everything is so soft. 10/10. I need more colors
I originally ordered the gray pants and fit perfect. I ordered the same size is black (both large) and the length is way shorter.
Havent worn them yet but the material is really nice and feels warm. The inside has this fleece like material and the pockets are all functional.
Quality comfy material. Just as pictured! Buy them!
Soft and thick fabric
My daughter lives these and they fit her perfectly!!
Very comfortable, true to size, love the extra cargo pockets!!

I really like these sweatpants. Especially for the gym! Material quality seems really sturdy so far. They’re great for the price! I did size up though and it is still a little tight around my thighs and glutes. The color is exactly as pictured, I purchased the grey ones.

Sized up and they are nice and baggy. The pockets are a good size but the pockets by the hip are a different, paper-y feeling fabric that is borderline itchy, noisy, and feels like it will rip easily. Would not re-order because I find the crinkly pockets jarring and uncomfortable. Plus I fear putting something in there and feeling in drop down my leg if they rip; I guess the elastic at the ankle would catch it but yuck. Definitely would not recommend putting keys in there.
They're shorter than expected so then the side cargo pockets look odd. Not a fan
I bought these pants for when I travel and they are great. They have so many pockets that are pretty deep. They are also warm and very comfortable for long travel days.

I am in love with these pants. I’m a tall girl with long legs, and finding sweatpants that aren’t short on me are always a problem. Got these on a Black Friday sale and thought why not after reading reviews & im so glad I did they fit so well, and are so comfy & I’m definitely going to be getting more in more colors. The only thing I’m not a huge fan is the fabric in the pockets but literally that’s it everything else I love about these pants.
Very flattering! I’m 155 lbs 5’7” with 40 inch hips and medium was perfect. Just the right amount of baby while still making your bum look good. Perfect length too for my height.
Love it warm and comfy

These are nice sweatpants and thick material. I wanted to keep them but l had to return them because the waistband isn't stretchy enough and was uncomfortable. My waist is wider now that I had a baby and I was looking for comfy sweatpants but the waistband isn’t giving comfort.
Really nice

I love cargo sweat pants. These are my go to pants this winter. I have now purchased two pairs. They are exactly what I need. I am 143 pounds and although somewhat baggy, the large works  perfectly for me because I do not like them tight on my waist. I also wear thin thermals underneath because I live where it gets very cold in the winter. If you don’t wear thermals under them and you have a flatter stomach than me then the medium size would probably work fine for you.  The pockets are so convenient because I do not like to carry a purse. I highly recommend. Nice, thick, well-made sweat pants.

I really loved the first pair I got. They’re so warm and comfy. My only complaint is they shrunk in the dryer. It’s entirely my fault because normally I don’t dry my clothes, but they slipped through.  I’d recommend sizing up with that in mind.
Great oversized looked, perfect for the gym and easy to slip off. Very thick material perfect for the cold weather
Got these for my sister, and she loves them. They are super soft and have pockets! They look great too imo. Great for a day in bed or a night out with friends.
Terrible quality for $23, inside the pockets are mad weird and I’m only 5’8 I got a size medium and they don’t even make it to my ankles
These are truly the best sweatpants!! I wear them multiple times a week lol

These are exactly what I was looking for! I will definitely be ordering another pair or two. These pants deliver in comfort, mobility and stretch, quality and pockets! So far no issues with the material - it washes well with no color fading or changes in material feel or size. I sized down since I’m shorter and recently lost weight but the pants are still oversized. I probably could’ve sized down one more but other than that, love these!  For reference, I’m 5ft 2in, about 130lbs, and ordered a size Small in black.
I was so happy with the first order that I purchased these in 2 more colors. Very comfortable and can dress them up or use for loungewear. The fleece lining is warm and soft.

I will post a pic when I wear them, I tried them on and decided to keep, not an amazing fit, but going to make it work, they’re sweatpants, sweatpants is my uniform. Used to be scrubs!! But will note they are baggier than expected, I could’ve for sure sized down. With that being said, I like the feel, the quality is good and the color is what I expected.
Very well made and very comfortable.  Perfect for cold winter nights on the couch!  Pockets very roomy.  I have long legs and the length was just perfect.

There are the best, so comfortable, just the perfect pair of sweat pants! They are on the heavy side, but perfect for me since I get cold easily. I’m 5’4 and I Yeah weigh 138! I’m really glad that I went with the medium because they fit my waist perfectly

I wish it was longer I’m 5’7’’ it looks good standing and fits okay just wish there was a taller option. Very warm and thick. The pockets are nice. If you are short then it’s perfect. Fit me okay just needs to be longer
Like these sweats a lot.

The thickness of the pants is perfect for me because my legs tend to get cold easily and these keep me nice and warm during this time of year. I bought a light colored one in size medium and I'm a size 6 for reference and they fit comfortably.

评论概述: Wasn’t as stretchy as I was hoping for.
评论详情: I wanted these to be the pants I could have the laziest, coziest most comfortable day of rotting on the couch reading and napping. These were too heavy and not streatchy enough. A bit too stiff for my liking. Also a bit snug on the waste-like when u eat too much at thanksgiving and want to unbutton your pants but can’t. That feeling..

This is a very thick fabric. I was hoping to be able to work out in them, but it would be too hot. Also, the top of the pockets doesn't lay flat even after washing and druing it just stick out like two airplane wings due to the thickness.

评论概述: Runs SUPER large… and it’s awesome
评论详情: Originally got these for my daughter because she’s in her tween baggy pants phase, I’m 5’8” male 175 lbs and this is how they look on me, since they were just huge on her. This is a small by the way! And I love them! They don’t make guys sweats like this anymore.
These have become my new go-to pants for air travel and just leaving the house when I don’t feel like putting on jeans
I love the loose fit and fabric. The problem was that it ripped on the inside after 30 minutes wearing it.
Bought three of these - very warm and soft.  Love them.Edit of my previous review - old and cold in Pennsylvania and just got my fourth pair of these.  So soft and warm.  Absolutely recommend them.
This pants seem cute , but the material is way too thick. They aren't made to be loose fitting like the picture shows. Just oddly baggy in the crotch and below the knees.

Thick fleece material and a satin type inner pocket I could have sized to a medium but I like the baggy fit on my legs. If I put on a medium they would be snug to my body. I'm a 30in waist and a 41 in hip

评论概述: They said oversized, they meant it
评论详情: I found these to be the most comfy pair of sweats I've tried. However, they're huge, I know it says oversized joggers though so I'm giving them 5 stars. I also found the material to be good quality and soft.

they're unbelievably huge. like comically huge. i'm normally an XS and the S is like clown pants on me. i don't care bc they are so so so comfy, but if you're looking for a more fitted look then these aren't the sweats for you.

评论概述: The stupidest and most comfortable thing I've bought this year
评论详情: They're so ridiculous. Huge, fluffy, thick pants with enormous pockets and an outline that turns me into even more of a pear. These are not for fashion, but they're incredibly comfortable, reasonably priced, and the drawstring and cuffed bottoms make them wearable despite the size. They've washed well (albeit with plenty of lint) and seem to be well made!
Love these- so comfortable.
Ordered a small, more like a large
I can't help but love the comfortability of this pant. The material is so soft and soothing to the skin, yet stylish. Doesn't shrink even after several washes.
They came up way too short. It said they were long and would be good for tall girls. If you have long legs, I don’t recommend.
So big. Wish there was an option to exchange instead of return
Cute but run short
Truly the comfiest sweats I’ve ever had!! So flattering with big pockets and was so wonderful for a long haul flight!
Granddaughter luvs these cargo pants warm great fir for the chilly days that r coming up and the side pockets come in so handy 😀 large true to size very roomy
Thick and soft. High quality.  Great fit and look.

If you want a fitted look, keep your original size. If you want a baggy look you should really size up. I got these in a large thinking they'd be a little loose but they're quite fitted and I haven't washed and dried them yet so I'm thinking they might shrink a little. BUT they are SO comfortable, the perfect pair of sweat pants! They look good enough to wear out in public. They are on the heavy side, perfect for fall/winter. I know they will look good with boots.
Pants are comfy, warm, and very thick. Not ideal for hot weather but depends on what you want
Good seam quality, grey color is true to picture, the inside is a fuzzy material and the pockets are well constructed
These pants fit me perfectly. I have no complaints about them and you shouldn't either as long as you get measurements right to tailor to your body specifically. I highly recommend them, thanks.
These are well made, comfortable, nice looking pants. Fabric is medium weight, soft, and warm. My only complaint is that I wish they were a bit longer (I am 5’10’’).
These are so comfortable AND warm, I am seriously considering buying another one.

I’m 5’9 and L fits perfect for my long legs, however I’m going to exchange for an XL for an oversized look. Nice material for the price. My only complaint (which doesn’t really bother me) is that the material inside the pockets are pretty cheap.
Whatever the paper material is inside the pants will drive you crazy.
Size down or get your normal size! Otherwise they'll be huge

Soft thick material, cute fit, and long enough to cover my 5’8 leg length. Good quality material, not flimsy at all. Medium fit slightly loose & it’s totally what I wanted. I bought a 2nd pair.  Get it!
Perfect fit, perfect color and perfect quality. I will absolutely order more.
These are my new favorite Sweats
Fits perfect

These pants fit loose but somehow the cargo accent keeps them from looking sloppy.  You cannot dry these pants in the dryer and i think that’s weird for such a wash and go type item. China product  Pockets are made in such a way that they don’t slip out and give you rabbit ears. Pocket liners stay in the pockets.  These are “go to sweat pants” and I think they’ll be around for quite some time. These pants are very well made and worth the money!  Highly recommend is you’re serious about your sweat pants.

评论概述: Im buying more colors. So good!
评论详情: Exactly what I’ve been looking for! Material is so thick and cozy! Great value, super cute, nice pockets. Color is true to photo.  I’m 5’7, 104lbs and I ordered an xs. They are a baggy fit, the drawstring on the waste is good quality and you can adjust nicely.

I've got the light and dark grey pair of these.. and may I add very comfy indeed. I just ordered my third pair of these in black, love the fact that they have pockets and they really very stylish for sweatpants too 😍. I thought they'd be really long considering I'm very short and to be honest there not maybe because of the elastic band at the bottom of joggers, the Value for the price is a deal breaker too. I'm pretty sure I can lounge in these and go and about in them.. they are on the tad heavy weight side so I don't see them being a good workout pair of joggers but definitely something like I said lounge or just going out on a colder falls day or winter day with a cute pair of boots..thanks Amazon will continue to get more and maybe even some hoodies to see if I can at least make a set.. maybe...
These pants were super heavy as advertised and fit great in the waist, however, they were absolutely huge at the bottom of the leg, not flattering at all

These were absolutely perfect and so cute but for some reason they decided to use entirely different material for the pockets. It’s rough stiff fabric which is quite uncomfortable on the legs. Not sure the thought was on this, the rest of the material is so comfy! Bummer
I use these on my flights. It has good size pockets for my phone. Very comfortable to use for 6+ hours.

Love love love these sweatpants. ordered a Large and it's a bit too big, but it is fine as I only plan to lounge in those. They are very soft and warm inside and I love the cargo pants vibe with the extra side pockets!

The fabric is really warm, I got a size up to be kinda baggy and cuz I’m pretty tall, but it fits exactly how i wanted. It’s so comfortable and really good quality fabric, it came kinda wrinkly but I put them on and after like and hour it smoothed itself out, 10/10 will probably buy more colors. Also the color I ordered (light blue) came just like the photo

I would give these a five, because they are super soft and comfy, but they fall a little short due to the pocket lining being a super scratchy uncomfortable fabric. They also are massive, so they fit more for casual sweats. That may be my bad though, they're relatively stretchy so I probably could've ordered a size down. So, if you're looking for super soft, thick, faux cargo pants and don't mind the pockets, they're great!

These sweatpants are very warm and thick! they don't wear down easily, and they're very soft and comfortable! Even though the description for these sweatpants says they can be worn for any occasion(walking, running, hiking, etc), I wouldn't recommend these pants for any strenuous activity, because of how thick and warm they are. I worked out a couple of times in these but got hot and sweaty very quickly. They also run a little large, and I would recommend buying a size down. For reference, I am 5' and 100  lbs and I bought a small. They were bigger than I expected, but I guess they're perfect for lounging. Overall, love these sweatpants! I definitely would recommend it!
Runs large and fabric very heavy.
I wanted sweatpants that fit my long legs comfortably. These are them!! Highly recommend and love the pockets

I'm 169cm, about 63kg. bought the large. love them so much I also bought 4 different colors. I wanted the slightly baggy, hang off my midwaist look. they are very warm and soft inside. have not changed size since washing/drying.
this product is extremely comfortable and cozy. It’s oversized to be warned, but it’s not too oversized to look huge haha.
These are my favorite pants now, I ordered another because I love them so much :)

评论详情: These sweatpants are super comfortable, soft and they look super cute.
So comfy and just the right fit!!! Love them… ordered two more colors

Cute and good quality!  A little heavy/thicker material.  Size down if you are in between sizes.  I bought them for my self and they were too big.  They do not offer an XS.  That is my only complaint!
